verses.verse: Beloved, <S%G27><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> not every <S%G3956><s%> spirit, <S%G4151><s%> but try <S%G1381><s%> the spirits <S%G4151><s%> whether <S%G1487><s%> they are of God: <S%G2316><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> false <S%G5578><s%> prophets <S%G5578><s%> are gone <S%G1831><s%> out into <S%G1519><s%> the world. <S%G2889><s%>

Hereby <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5129><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> you the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> that confesses <S%G3670><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> is come <S%G2064><s%> in the flesh <S%G4561><s%> is of God: <S%G2316><s%>

And every <S%G3956><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> that confesses <S%G3670><s%> not that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> is come <S%G2064><s%> in the flesh <S%G4561><s%> is not of God: <S%G2316><s%> and this <S%G5124><s%> is that spirit of antichrist, <S%G500><s%> whereof <S%G3739><s%> you have heard <S%G191><s%> that it should come; <S%G2064><s%> and even <S%G2532><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> already <S%G2235><s%> is it in the world. <S%G2889><s%>

You are of God, <S%G2316><s%> little <S%G5040><s%> children, <S%G5040><s%> and have overcome <S%G3528><s%> them: because <S%G3754><s%> greater <S%G3187><s%> is he that is in you, than <S%G2228><s%> he that is in the world. <S%G2889><s%>
They are of the world: <S%G2889><s%> therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> they of the world, <S%G2889><s%> and the world <S%G2889><s%> hears <S%G191><s%> them.

We are of God: <S%G2316><s%> he that knows <S%G1097><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hears <S%G191><s%> us; he that is not of God <S%G2316><s%> hears <S%G191><s%> not us. Hereby <S%G1537><s%> <S%G5124><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> we the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of truth, <S%G225><s%> and the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of error. <S%G4106><s%>

Beloved, <S%G27><s%> let us love <S%G25><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another: <S%G240><s%> for love <S%G26><s%> is of God; <S%G2316><s%> and every <S%G3956><s%> one that loves <S%G25><s%> is born <S%G1080><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and knows <S%G1097><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>
He that loves <S%G25><s%> not knows <S%G1097><s%> not God; <S%G2316><s%> for God <S%G2316><s%> is love. <S%G26><s%>

In this <S%G5129><s%> was manifested <S%G5319><s%> the love <S%G26><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> toward <S%G1722><s%> us, because <S%G3754><s%> that God <S%G2316><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> his only <S%G3439><s%> begotten <S%G3439><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world, <S%G2889><s%> that we might live <S%G2198><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> him.

Herein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5129><s%> is love, <S%G26><s%> not that we loved <S%G25><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> but that he loved <S%G25><s%> us, and sent <S%G649><s%> his Son <S%G5207><s%> to be the propitiation <S%G2434><s%> for our sins. <S%G266><s%>
Beloved, <S%G27><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> us, we ought <S%G3784><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to love <S%G25><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another. <S%G240><s%>

No <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> has seen <S%G2300><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> at <S%G4455><s%> any <S%G4455><s%> time. <S%G4455><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> we love <S%G26><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> dwells <S%G3306><s%> in us, and his love <S%G25><s%> is perfected <S%G5048><s%> in us.
Hereby <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5129><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> we that we dwell <S%G3306><s%> in him, and he in us, because <S%G3754><s%> he has given <S%G1325><s%> us of his Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>
And we have seen <S%G2300><s%> and do testify <S%G3140><s%> that the Father <S%G3962><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> to be the Savior <S%G4990><s%> of the world. <S%G2889><s%>

Whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall confess <S%G3670><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> is the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> dwells <S%G3306><s%> in him, and he in God. <S%G2316><s%>

And we have known <S%G1097><s%> and believed <S%G4100><s%> the love <S%G26><s%> that God <S%G2316><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> to us. God <S%G2316><s%> is love; <S%G26><s%> and he that dwells <S%G3306><s%> in love <S%G26><s%> dwells <S%G3306><s%> in God, <S%G2316><s%> and God <S%G2316><s%> in him.

Herein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5129><s%> is our love <S%G26><s%> made <S%G5048><s%> perfect, <S%G5048><s%> that we may have <S%G2192><s%> boldness <S%G3954><s%> in the day <S%G2250><s%> of judgment: <S%G2920><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> as he is, so <S%G2532><s%> are we in this <S%G5129><s%> world. <S%G2889><s%>

There is no <S%G3756><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> in love; <S%G26><s%> but perfect <S%G5046><s%> love <S%G26><s%> casts <S%G906><s%> out fear: <S%G5401><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> torment. <S%G2851><s%> He that fears <S%G5399><s%> is not made <S%G5048><s%> perfect <S%G5048><s%> in love. <S%G26><s%>
We love <S%G25><s%> him, because <S%G3754><s%> he first <S%G4413><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> us.

If <S%G1437><s%> a man say, <S%G2036><s%> I love <S%G25><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and hates <S%G3404><s%> his brother, <S%G80><s%> he is a liar: <S%G5583><s%> for he that loves <S%G25><s%> not his brother <S%G80><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> he has seen, <S%G3708><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> he love <S%G25><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> he has not seen? <S%G3708><s%>
And this <S%G5026><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> we from him, That he who loves <S%G25><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> love <S%G25><s%> his brother <S%G80><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>
